HAL Recruitment 2025 - Walk- in for 278 Apprentices Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 11:52 IST
 Hindustan Aeronautics Limited
 278 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 8,000 to 9,000




FOLLOW

The Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 278 Graduate Apprentices, Diploma Apprentices, and Non-Technical Apprentices. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics Engineering, B. Pharm, B.Sc Nursing, and Any Degree can apply for the HAL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

HAL Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Graduate Apprentice	130	B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics Engineering, B. Pharm
Diploma Apprentices	60	Diploma in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics Engineering
Non-Technical Apprentices	88	Any Degree, B.Sc Nursing

HAL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 50 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

HAL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

HAL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

HAL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 8,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 9,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the HAL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the HAL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Carry all the required documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

KINO Auditorium, HAL Township, Mumbai-Agra Highway, Ojhar, Tal-Niphad, Dist-Nashik Pin 422207

Important Dates:

Starting date	25-08-2025
Closing date	29-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
